00008 dfsch_object_t* dfsch_make_condition(dfsch_type_t* type){
00009   dfsch__condition_t* c;
00010   if (!DFSCH_INSTANCE_P(type, DFSCH_STANDARD_TYPE) ||
00011       !dfsch_superclass_p(type, DFSCH_CONDITION_TYPE)){
00012     dfsch_error("Not a condition type", (dfsch_object_t*)type);
00013   }
00014 
00015   c = (dfsch__condition_t*)dfsch_make_object(type);
00016   c->fields = NULL;
00017 
00018   return (dfsch_object_t*)c;
00019 }
00020 
00021 static void condition_write(dfsch__condition_t* c, 
00022                             dfsch_writer_state_t* state){
00023   dfsch_object_t* i = c->fields;
00024   dfsch_object_t* j;
00025   
00026   dfsch_write_unreadable_start(state, c);
00027   
00028   while (DFSCH_PAIR_P(i)){
00029     j = DFSCH_FAST_CAR(i);
00030     i = DFSCH_FAST_CDR(i);
00031     if (!DFSCH_PAIR_P(j)){
00032       dfsch_write_string(state, "*malformed-fileds*");
00033       dfsch_write_unreadable_end(state);
00034       return;
00035     }
00036     if (DFSCH_TYPE_OF(DFSCH_FAST_CAR(j)) == DFSCH_SYMBOL_TYPE &&
00037         dfsch_compare_symbol(DFSCH_FAST_CAR(j), "stack-trace")){
00038       continue;
00039     }
00040     dfsch_write_object(state, DFSCH_FAST_CAR(j)); 
00041     dfsch_write_string(state, " "); 
00042     dfsch_write_object(state, DFSCH_FAST_CDR(j)); 
00043     if (DFSCH_PAIR_P(i)){
00044       dfsch_write_string(state, " ");
00045     }
00046   }
00047 
00048   dfsch_write_unreadable_end(state);
00049 }
00050 
00051 dfsch_object_t* dfsch_condition_field(dfsch_object_t* condition,
00052                                       dfsch_object_t* name){
00053   dfsch_object_t* al;
00054   dfsch__condition_t* c = dfsch_assert_instance(condition, 
00055                                                 DFSCH_CONDITION_TYPE);
00056   al = dfsch_assq(name, c->fields);
00057   if (!al){
00058     return NULL;
00059   } else {
00060     return dfsch_cdr(al);
00061   }
00062 }
00063 void dfsch_condition_put_field(dfsch_object_t* condition,
00064                                dfsch_object_t* name,
00065                                dfsch_object_t* value){
00066   dfsch__condition_t* c = dfsch_assert_instance(condition, 
00067                                                 DFSCH_CONDITION_TYPE);
00068 
00069   c->fields = dfsch_cons(dfsch_cons(name, value), c->fields);
00070 }
00071 dfsch_object_t* dfsch_condition_field_cstr(dfsch_object_t* condition,
00072                                            char* name){
00073   return dfsch_condition_field(condition, dfsch_make_symbol(name));
00074 }
00075 void dfsch_condition_put_field_cstr(dfsch_object_t* condition,
00076                                     char* name,
00077                                     dfsch_object_t* value){
00078   return dfsch_condition_put_field(condition, dfsch_make_symbol(name), value);
00079 }
00080 dfsch_object_t* dfsch_condition_fields(dfsch_object_t* condition){
00081   return ((dfsch__condition_t*)
00082           dfsch_assert_instance(condition, 
00083                                 DFSCH_CONDITION_TYPE))->fields;
00084 }
00085 
00086 dfsch_object_t* dfsch_condition(dfsch_type_t* type, ...){
00087   va_list al;
00088   dfsch_object_t* c = dfsch_make_condition(type);
00089   char* name;
00090 
00091   va_start(al, type);
00092   while (name = va_arg(al, char*)){
00093     dfsch_condition_put_field_cstr(c, name, va_arg(al, dfsch_object_t*));
00094   }
00095   va_end(al);
00096 
00097   return c;
00098 }
00099 void dfsch_signal_condition(dfsch_type_t* type, 
00100                                        char* message,
00101                                        ...){
00102   va_list al;
00103   dfsch_object_t* c = dfsch_make_condition(type);
00104   char* name;
00105 
00106   va_start(al, type);
00107   while (name = va_arg(al, char*)){
00108     dfsch_condition_put_field_cstr(c, name, va_arg(al, dfsch_object_t*));
00109   }
00110   va_end(al);
00111   dfsch_condition_put_field_cstr(c, "message", 
00112                                  dfsch_make_string_cstr(message));
00113 
00114   dfsch_signal(c);
00115 }

00118 dfsch_object_t* dfsch_condition_with_fields(dfsch_type_t* type,
00119                                             dfsch_object_t* message,
00120                                             dfsch_object_t* fields){
00121   dfsch_object_t* c = dfsch_make_condition(type);
00122   dfsch_object_t* name;
00123   dfsch_object_t* value;
00124   
00125   dfsch_condition_put_field_cstr(c, "message", message);
00126   while (DFSCH_PAIR_P(fields)){
00127     name = DFSCH_FAST_CAR(fields);
00128     fields = DFSCH_FAST_CDR(fields);
00129     if (!DFSCH_PAIR_P(fields)){
00130       dfsch_error("Missing value for keyword", name);
00131     }
00132     value = DFSCH_FAST_CAR(fields);
00133     fields = DFSCH_FAST_CDR(fields);
00134     dfsch_condition_put_field(c, name, value);
00135   }
00136 
00137   return c;
00138 }

00161 static int invoke_debugger_on_all_conditions = 0;
00162 
00163 void dfsch_signal(dfsch_object_t* condition){
00164   dfsch__handler_list_t* save;
00165   dfsch__handler_list_t* i;
00166   dfsch__thread_info_t* ti = dfsch__get_thread_info();
00167 
00168   i = save = ti->handler_list;
00169 
00170   while (i){
00171     if (DFSCH_INSTANCE_P(condition, i->type)){
00172       ti->handler_list = i->next;
00173       dfsch_apply(i->handler, dfsch_cons(condition, NULL));
00174     }
00175     i = i->next;
00176   }
00177 
00178 
00179   if (DFSCH_INSTANCE_P(condition, DFSCH_ERROR_TYPE)){
00180     dfsch_enter_debugger(condition);
00181     fputs("Unhandled error condition!\n\n", stderr);
00182     fprintf(stderr, "%s\n", dfsch_object_2_string(condition, 10, 1));
00183     dfsch_print_trace_buffer();
00184     abort();
00185   } else if (invoke_debugger_on_all_conditions){
00186     dfsch_enter_debugger(condition);    
00187   }
00188 
00189   ti->handler_list = save;
00190 }

00194 static dfsch_object_t* debugger_proc = NULL;
00195 static int max_debugger_recursion = 10;
00196 
00197 void dfsch_set_debugger(dfsch_object_t* proc){
00198   debugger_proc = proc;
00199 }
00200 void dfsch_set_invoke_debugger_on_all_conditions(int val){
00201   invoke_debugger_on_all_conditions = val;
00202 }
00203 
00204 static int debugger_depth = 0;
00205 static pthread_mutex_t debugger_depth_mutex= PTHREAD_MUTEX_INITIALIZER;
00206 
00207 void dfsch_enter_debugger(dfsch_object_t* reason){
00208   pthread_mutex_lock(&debugger_depth_mutex);
00209   if (debugger_depth > max_debugger_recursion){
00210     pthread_mutex_unlock(&debugger_depth_mutex);
00211     fputs("Debugger recursion limit exceeded!\n\n", stderr);
00212     return;
00213   }
00214   debugger_depth++;
00215   pthread_mutex_unlock(&debugger_depth_mutex);
00216 
00217   DFSCH_UNWIND {
00218     if (debugger_proc){
00219       dfsch_apply(debugger_proc, dfsch_cons(reason, NULL));
00220     }
00221   } DFSCH_PROTECT {
00222     pthread_mutex_lock(&debugger_depth_mutex);
00223     debugger_depth--;
00224     pthread_mutex_unlock(&debugger_depth_mutex);
00225   } DFSCH_PROTECT_END;
00226 }
00227 
00228 int dfsch_get_debugger_depth(){
00229   int r;
00230   pthread_mutex_lock(&debugger_depth_mutex);
00231   r = debugger_depth;
00232   pthread_mutex_unlock(&debugger_depth_mutex);
00233   return r;
00234 }

00236 typedef struct restart_t {
00237   dfsch_type_t* type;
00238   dfsch_object_t* name;
00239   dfsch_object_t* proc;
00240   char* description;
00241   char* arg_descriptions;
00242   dfsch__handler_list_t* handlers;
00243 } restart_t;
00244 
00245 dfsch_type_t dfsch_restart_type = {
00246   DFSCH_STANDARD_TYPE,
00247   NULL,
00248   sizeof(restart_t),
00249   "restart"
00250 };
00251 dfsch_object_t* dfsch_make_restart(dfsch_object_t* name,
00252                                    dfsch_object_t* proc,
00253                                    char* description,
00254                                    char* arg_descriptions){
00255   restart_t* r = (restart_t*) dfsch_make_object(DFSCH_RESTART_TYPE);
00256 
00257   r->name = name;
00258   r->proc = proc;
00259   r->description = description;
00260   r->arg_descriptions = arg_descriptions;
00261 
00262   return (dfsch_object_t*) r;
00263 }
00264 dfsch_object_t* dfsch_restart_name(dfsch_object_t* restart){
00265   return ((restart_t*)dfsch_assert_type(restart, DFSCH_RESTART_TYPE))->name;
00266 }
00267 dfsch_object_t* dfsch_restart_proc(dfsch_object_t* restart){
00268   return ((restart_t*)dfsch_assert_type(restart, DFSCH_RESTART_TYPE))->proc;
00269 }
00270 char* dfsch_restart_description(dfsch_object_t* restart){
00271   return ((restart_t*)dfsch_assert_type(restart, DFSCH_RESTART_TYPE))->description;
00272 }

00274 void dfsch_restart_bind(dfsch_object_t* restart){
00275   dfsch__thread_info_t* ti = dfsch__get_thread_info();
00276   dfsch__restart_list_t* l = GC_NEW(dfsch__restart_list_t);
00277 
00278   l->next = ti->restart_list;
00279   l->restart = restart;
00280 
00281   ti->restart_list = l;
00282 }
00283 void dfsch_handler_bind(dfsch_type_t* type,
00284                         dfsch_object_t* handler){
00285   dfsch__thread_info_t* ti = dfsch__get_thread_info();
00286   dfsch__handler_list_t* l = GC_NEW(dfsch__handler_list_t);
00287   
00288   l->next = ti->handler_list;
00289   l->type = type;
00290   l->handler = handler;
00291 
00292   ti->handler_list = l;
00293 }

00295 dfsch_object_t* dfsch_compute_restarts(){
00296   dfsch__thread_info_t* ti = dfsch__get_thread_info();
00297   dfsch__restart_list_t* i = ti->restart_list;
00298   dfsch_object_t* head = NULL;
00299   dfsch_object_t* tail;
00300 
00301   while (i){
00302     dfsch_object_t* tmp = dfsch_cons(i->restart, NULL); 
00303     if (head){
00304       DFSCH_FAST_CDR_MUT(tail) = tmp;
00305       tail = tmp;
00306     } else {
00307       head = tail = tmp;
00308     }
00309     i = i->next;
00310   }
00311 
00312   return head;
00313 }
00314 
00315 dfsch_object_t* dfsch_invoke_restart(dfsch_object_t* restart, 
00316                                      dfsch_object_t* args){
00317   if (DFSCH_TYPE_OF(restart) != DFSCH_RESTART_TYPE){
00318     dfsch__thread_info_t* ti = dfsch__get_thread_info();
00319     dfsch__restart_list_t* i = ti->restart_list;
00320     while (i){
00321       if (dfsch_restart_name(i->restart) == restart){
00322         break;
00323       }
00324       i = i->next;
00325     }
00326     if (!i){
00327       dfsch_error("No such restart", restart);
00328     }
00329     restart = i->restart;
00330   }
00331 
00332   return dfsch_apply(dfsch_restart_proc(restart), args);
00333 }

00336 static dfsch_object_t* throw_proc(dfsch_object_t* tag,
00337                                   dfsch_object_t* args,
00338                                   dfsch_tail_escape_t* esc){
00339   DFSCH_ARG_END(args);
00340   dfsch_throw(tag, NULL);
00341 }

00343 dfsch_object_t* dfsch_make_throw_proc(dfsch_object_t* catch_tag){

00348                                   dfsch_tail_escape_t* esc){
00349   dfsch_object_t* arg;
00350   DFSCH_OBJECT_ARG(args, arg);
00351   DFSCH_ARG_END(args);
00352   dfsch_throw(tag, arg);
00353 }

00359 void dfsch_type_error(dfsch_object_t* datum, dfsch_type_t* type, 
00360                       int instance_suffices){
00361   char* m;
00362   dfsch_object_t* c = dfsch_make_condition(DFSCH_TYPE_ERROR_TYPE);
00363   dfsch_condition_put_field_cstr(c, "datum", datum);
00364   dfsch_condition_put_field_cstr(c, "type", type);
00365   dfsch_condition_put_field_cstr(c, "instance-suffices?", 
00366                                  dfsch_bool(instance_suffices));
00367   if (instance_suffices){
00368     m = dfsch_saprintf("%s is not an instance of %s",
00369                        dfsch_object_2_string(datum, 10, 1),
00370                        dfsch_object_2_string((dfsch_object_t*)type, 10, 1));
00371   } else {
00372     m = dfsch_saprintf("%s is not of type %s",
00373                        dfsch_object_2_string(datum, 10, 1),
00374                        dfsch_object_2_string((dfsch_object_t*)type, 10, 1));
00375   }
00376   dfsch_condition_put_field_cstr(c, "message", dfsch_make_string_cstr(m));
00377   dfsch_signal(c);
00378 }
00379 
00380 dfsch_type_t dfsch_operating_system_error_type = 
00381   DFSCH_CONDITION_TYPE_INIT(DFSCH_RUNTIME_ERROR_TYPE, 
00382                             "operating-system-error");
00383 void dfsch_operating_system_error_saved(int e, char* funname){
00384   dfsch_object_t* c = dfsch_make_condition(DFSCH_OPERATING_SYSTEM_ERROR_TYPE);
00385   char* m = strerror(e);
00386 
00387   dfsch_condition_put_field_cstr(c, "errno", DFSCH_MAKE_FIXNUM(e));
00388   dfsch_condition_put_field_cstr(c, "function", 
00389                                  dfsch_make_string_cstr(funname));
00390   dfsch_condition_put_field_cstr(c, "message", dfsch_make_string_cstr(m));
00391   dfsch_signal(c);
00392 }
00393 void dfsch_operating_system_error(char* funname){
00394   dfsch_operating_system_error_saved(errno, funname);
00395 }

00518 /*
00519  * This is generally non-sufficient interface, but rest could be implemented 
00520  * as macros.
00521  */
00522 
00523 DFSCH_DEFINE_FORM_IMPL(handler_bind, NULL){
00524   dfsch_object_t* ret;
00525   dfsch_object_t* bindings;
00526   dfsch_object_t* code;
00527   DFSCH_OBJECT_ARG(args, bindings);
00528   DFSCH_ARG_REST(args, code);
00529 
00530   DFSCH_SAVE_HANDLERS;
00531 
00532   while (DFSCH_PAIR_P(bindings)){
00533     dfsch_object_t* type;
00534     dfsch_object_t* handler;
00535     DFSCH_OBJECT_ARG(DFSCH_FAST_CAR(bindings), type);
00536     DFSCH_OBJECT_ARG(DFSCH_FAST_CAR(bindings), handler);
00537     DFSCH_ARG_END(DFSCH_FAST_CAR(bindings));
00538 
00539     type = dfsch_eval(type, env);
00540     handler = dfsch_eval(handler, env);
00541 
00542     dfsch_handler_bind(type, handler);
00543     bindings = DFSCH_FAST_CDR(bindings);
00544   }
00545 
00546   ret = dfsch_eval_proc(code, env);
00547 
00548   DFSCH_RESTORE_HANDLERS;
00549   return ret;
00550 }
00551 
00552 DFSCH_DEFINE_FORM_IMPL(restart_bind, NULL){
00553   dfsch_object_t* ret;
00554   dfsch_object_t* bindings;
00555   dfsch_object_t* code;
00556   DFSCH_OBJECT_ARG(args, bindings);
00557   DFSCH_ARG_REST(args, code);
00558 
00559   DFSCH_SAVE_HANDLERS;
00560 
00561   while (DFSCH_PAIR_P(bindings)){
00562     dfsch_object_t* name;
00563     dfsch_object_t* proc;
00564     DFSCH_OBJECT_ARG(DFSCH_FAST_CAR(bindings), name);
00565     DFSCH_OBJECT_ARG(DFSCH_FAST_CAR(bindings), proc);
00566     DFSCH_ARG_END(DFSCH_FAST_CAR(bindings));
00567 
00568     proc = dfsch_eval(proc, env);
00569 
00570     // TODO
00571     dfsch_restart_bind(dfsch_make_restart(name, proc, "", NULL));
00572     bindings = DFSCH_FAST_CDR(bindings);
00573   }
00574 
00575   ret = dfsch_eval_proc(code, env);
00576 
00577   DFSCH_RESTORE_HANDLERS;
00578   return ret;
00579 }
00580
